summary: A New Way to Express Pain in Crypto: Pain But Make It Fun! - Have you ever been rekt in the crypto market? Bought the top and sold the bottom? FOMOed into a coin only to get rugged? Don’t worry, we’ve all been there. That’s exactly why $OUCH was created! So, join us and use $OUCH to express your crypto “pain” and laugh through all the market’s ups and downs.
